snippet: Abi Morgan's "Lovesong" is playing at London's Lyric Hammersmith Theater, which is probably the wettest house in town, given all the tears being shed there.
abstract: Abi Morgan's "Lovesong" is playing at London's Lyric Hammersmith Theater, which is probably the wettest house in town, given all the tears being shed there.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Abi Morgan has built such a successful career out of measuring time that you half expect her to open a clock shop next. Ms. Morgan's chronological charts for the screen - scripts that portray past and present more or less side by side - have made her the flavor of the moment in high-middle-brow entertainment here.

headline.main: London Theater Journal: It's About Time
